title: Allahabad University Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Associate I Posts
description: The University of Allahabad (Allahabad University) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Associate I Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech and M.Sc. can apply for the Allahabad University Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, s...
